#summary &oslash character entity
#labels about-html,from-w3c
#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesO

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesO O] > &oslash

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Oslash;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d8/index.htm U+000D8].
  * `&Oslash` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d8/index.htm U+000D8].
  * `&oslash;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f8/index.htm U+000F8].
  * `&oslash` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f8/index.htm U+000F8].
